___href.description: a URI template, as defined by RFC 6570

___submissionSchema.description: Schema describing the data to submit along with the request

___hrefSchema.description: a schema for validating user input to the URI template, where the input is in the form of a JSON object with property names matching variable names in "href"

___targetSchema.description: JSON Schema describing the link target

___submissionEncType.description: The media type in which to submit data along with the request

___rel.description: relation to the target resource of the link

___mediaType.description: media type (as defined by RFC 2046) describing the link target

___base.description: URI Template resolved as for the 'href' keyword in the Link Description Object.  The resulting URI Reference is resolved against the current URI base and sets the new URI base for URI references within the instance.

___readOnly.description: If true, indicates that the value of this property is controlled by the server.

___type.description: A media type, as described in RFC 2046

___binaryEncoding.description: A content encoding scheme, as described in RFC 2045
